    BlockLootProviderBase.MatchStateBuilder

    This serves as a builder for a loot condition and a builder for a match tool predicate in one.

    A class used in the drops method to reduce ambiguity and make the code more readable.

  • Method Details

    • defaultBehavior

      @Nullable protected net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.LootTable.Builder defaultBehavior(net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block block)
      Description copied from class: LootProviderBase
      Creates a default loot table for the given item. Can be overridden to alter default behaviour. Should return null if no loot table should be generated.
      Specified by:
      defaultBehavior in class LootProviderBase<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>

    • needsLootTable

      protected boolean needsLootTable(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state)
      Returns whether this block state needs a loot table. If all block states of a block don't need a loot table, defaultBehavior will return null for that block. Can be overridden to alter the behaviour.

    • generateBaseTable

      public void generateBaseTable(net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block block, net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.entries.LootPoolEntryContainer.Builder<?> entry)

      Generate the base loot table.
      Overrides:

    • element

      protected SimpleLootFactory<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block> element()
      Description copied from class: LootProviderBase
      Gets the element factory. The element factory is a loot factory that assigns each element a loot entry. The default just assigns an empty entry.
      Overrides:
      element in class LootProviderBase<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>

    • silk

      public BlockLootProviderBase.SilkModifier silk(GenericLootModifier<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block> modifier)
      Turns a generic loot modifier into a silk modifier. This exists to reduce ambiguity. A silk modifier does not extend GenericLootModifier for this reason.

    • noSilk

      public BlockLootProviderBase.SilkModifier noSilk()
      Gets a new silk modifier that means: No special silk touch behaviour.

    • randomFortune

      public net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.predicates.LootItemCondition.Builder randomFortune(float baseChance)
      A condition that is random with a chance and optionally different chances for different fortune levels. Chances for different levels are computed automatically.

    • randomFortune

      public net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.predicates.LootItemCondition.Builder randomFortune(float baseChance, float... levelChances)
      A condition that is random with a chance and optionally different chances for different fortune levels.
      Parameters:
      baseChance - The chance without fortune.
      levelChances - the chances with fortune.
